Verses.14: When the hour came, Jesus, with his apostles, reclined at the table.
Verses.15: Then He said to them, "I have eagerly desired to eat this Passover with you before I suffer;
Verses.16: for I say to you that I shall not eat it again until it is fulfilled in the kingdom of God."
Verses.17: And when He had taken a cup and given thanks, He said, "Take this cup, and share it among yourselves.
Verses.18: For I say to you that I will no longer drink the fruit of the vine until the kingdom of God has come."
Verses.19: And when He had taken some bread and given thanks, He broke it. Then gave it to them, saying, "This is my body, which is being given for you; do this in remembrance of Me."
Verses.20: And in the same way, after they had eaten, He took the cup, saying, "This cup, which is poured out for you, is the new covenant in My blood."

Changes: 2022-08-07 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 22:14-20 used during the Eucharist.
